episode_summary: This episode covers a variety of intriguing topics, including the surprising fact that millions of people in China live in caves, a Latvian banker who accepts souls as collateral, the fictional Mountains of Kong on African maps, and the mating behaviors of Pennsylvania grass spiders.

facts.fact: 30 million Chinese people live in caves.
There is a banker in Latvia who will lend you money using your immortal soul as security.
For 100 years, almost all the maps we had of Africa contained a mountain range that didn't exist.
Male Pennsylvania grass spiders are much more likely to approach a female for sex if she has recently killed and eaten another male.
